alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 10 at 3:16AM EST until March 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Monroe. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
